home.slogan: Think and Trade like a Champion

newsPageSlogan: Headlines by Kurdchain brings you the latest cryptocurrency news, coin projects, blockchain news, stock market, and generally the financial market.
apiSlogan: Application Programming Interface (API) is a software intermediary that allows two applications to connect with each other.
contractSlogan: Contract is a document that states and explains a formal agreement between two different parties to deal with each other.
spotSlogan: A spot contract is the purchase or sale of a foreign currency at the market price
futureSlogan: A future contract is an agreement to buy or sell an asset at a certain date at a certain price.
aboutSlogan: Kurdchain is a financial trading community which was established in 2020 by a team of professional traders with over 5 years of experience in the field. We provide the best educational packages to serve investors and traders to have the best knowledge about financial market sectors. Also, we provide capital investment management services through Application Programming Interface (API) and contract. Kurdchain serves as an intermediary among the customers to make their exchanges possible and easier. Furthermore, it brings you the latest cryptocurrency news, coin projects, blockchain news, stock market, and generally the financial market. Lastly, our mission is to make professional and wealthy traders.

termsDetail: KurdChain fund management focuses on the methods and principles of developing investor’s capital in the cryptocurrency market. The main goal of this system is to focus on investors who aim to grow their capital financially and increase their incomes. KurdChain Fund Investment manages investor capital through two completely different systems; the API system and the contract system. These two systems are working on the long-term protection of investor's capital and focus on continuous profit and growth, as well as a reason for investors to reach or approach financial freedom
